explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper discusses clustering methods (model-based partitioning and k-means partitioning) to identify homogeneous groups of companies based on financial distress criteria, which is a typical unsupervised learning task.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using clustering techniques (model-based partitioning and k-means) to group companies based on their financial trajectories, making clustering a central method in this research.
